featuredProject.title: Layla — SaaS LegalTech Platform with AI
featuredProject.subtitle: Product Engineer · Frontend Lead · Founder
featuredProject.description: Building from scratch a SaaS LegalTech platform for managing Second Chance Law cases in Spain, automating internal workflows and legal documentation generation through AI.
featuredProject.extendedDescription: Layla is a SaaS LegalTech product aimed at legal sector companies in Spain, designed to centralize and automate the management of Second Chance Law cases. I develop the product entirely from scratch, primarily working on the frontend and user experience, while incorporating SaaS architecture concepts, cloud databases, deployment, and AI services. The project is continuously validated with real users in the legal sector.

responsibilities.design: Participation in the functional, technical and user experience design of the product.
responsibilities.architecture: Design and development from 0 to 1 with Lovable and Bolt.new, building the CRM structure based on Figma designs.
responsibilities.flows: Development of visual components, scalable architecture, API First and multitenant with VSC + Claude Code.
responsibilities.ai: Integration of Artificial Intelligence services for assisted generation of summaries, reports and legal drafts, supporting traditionally manual processes and significantly reducing operational workload.
responsibilities.database: REST API integration with PostgreSQL database on Supabase.
responsibilities.deployment: Cloud deployment environment configuration with Vercel, managing continuous deployment workflows.
responsibilities.discovery: Client relations. Product Discovery, testing and continuous feature development.
